#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>




int main() {
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    #endif
    int t, i, d, l;
    char a[1000];
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t != 0) {
        scanf("%s", a);
        i = 1; l = strlen(a);
        while (i < l) {
            d = 10*(a[i-1]-'0') + (a[i]-'0');
            if (d <= 12) {
                d = d*10 + a[i+1]-'0'; i += 1;
            }
            printf("%c", d);
            i += 2;
        }
        t -= 1;
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
